definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: We cannot afford to take risks when peoples' lives are at stake.
sentences.chinese: 現在人們性命交關，不容我們有閃失。

sentences.english: This time he would not allow any mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 這一次，他不能允許有任何的閃失。

sentences.english: I always feel that I have to watch him to make sure that he's OK.
sentences.chinese: 我總覺得我得看着他點兒，別讓他有個什麼閃失。

sentences.english: He didn't miss much at Ridgewood Country Club.
sentences.chinese: 他在瑞奇伍德鄉村俱樂部上的沒有什麼閃失。

sentences.english: If something goes wrong, the wire should safely pull out of their hand.
sentences.chinese: 如果有什麼閃失，電線應該能夠安全地從手中抽出。

sentences.english: I don't want any slipups now.
